trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The injured Yok Huy appears to be languishing in pain.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_TODO_00<tab>Search for the jar of pigment.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the jar of pigment to the injured Yok Huy.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_000<tab>Urrrgh... A moment, if you would, visitor. You see, I was en route to deliver pigment from Worlar's Echo to Sentinel just ahead.

TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_001<tab>But fool that I was, I let my guard down, and─<var 1A 02 /var>oogh<var 1A 01 /var>─when monsters attacked, I had no choice but to flee for my life, abandoning my rations and even my precious cargo.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_002<tab>The beasts can have the food for all I care, but that pigment is essential for the repair of our cave murals.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_003<tab>Thus I ask─aaagh!─no, I <var 1A 02 /var>beseech<var 1A 01 /var> you: go and retrieve the jar of pigment I left behind near the Sunken Stars!
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_005<tab>You'll find the pigment lying around somewhere near the Sunken Stars. Nnngh, they got me good...
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_010<tab>The pain has receded in the time you were away, if only a little. Have you found the pigment?
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_011<tab>Yes, this is it! Full glad am I to see it again, and with nary a crack in the jar. This will be of great use to the repair efforts.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_012<tab>Though these particular murals are shielded from the sun and other elements, they still fade with time, and so require regular upkeep.
TEXT_KINGZB104_05044_INJUREDYOKFUY05044_000_013<tab>I had intended to take part in the repairs myself, but...yeowch! I'm afraid I must first tend to my wounds at Sentinel.
